nodes.text: The Shattered City was the name given to the settlement built atop Perekta Mesa on the planet Makeb that was destroyed during the numerous groundquakes that occurred during the Conquest of Makeb. Numerous cracks in the mesa ripped apart the settlement, with only the eastern chunk of the city remaining mostly intact.
The Shattered City appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel, a 2013 Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
